mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, name, email, create_at, update_at, role_id) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, now(), now(), 1)
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.username, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.create_at, u.update_at, r.role_id, r.role_name from user u inner join role r on u.role_id = r.role_id where u.username = #{username}
